Summary Note:
The RM is a close family friend of Mathilde Emilie Rasmussen's parents, having known her since birth. This deep-rooted connection has facilitated a strong and trustworthy professional relationship.
Mathilde Emilie Rasmussen is a 68 year old retired CEO from Denmark. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Julius Baer's personalized approach and dedication to client success were key factors in her decision to join.
Family Background: Mathilde Emilie Rasmussen is currently divorced. Her child is named Krog.
Education Background:
In 1974, Mathilde finished her secondary school education at Slagelse Gymnasium.
Mathilde completed her university education at CBS International Business School in 1980.
Occupation History:
With a career spanning nearly 45 years, Mathilde Emilie Rasmussen has established herself as a key player in the industry.
At Jyske Bank A/S, Mathilde Emilie Rasmussen held the position of Family Office Manager from 1980 to 1982, developing essential skills in the field.
Her subsequent role was as a Investment Director at Sydbank A/S, where she continued to grow professionally from 1983 to 1984.
In 1985, she joined Danske Bank A/S as a CFO, taking on new challenges and responsibilities that helped her grow both personally and professionally.
Her next role was as a COO at Danske Bank A/S, where she applied her extensive experience to drive innovation from 1990 to 1994.
Until retiring, Mathilde Emilie Rasmussen served as a CEO at Jyske Bank A/S, contributing significantly from 1995 to 2017.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 10490000 DKK from her earnings at all companies.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of her mother, a successful Real Estate Developer, she received an inheritance of 199000 DKK in 2008, which she has used to secure her financial future.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome her as a new client.
